snippet: As the Sunken Garden Poetry Festival enters its 20th anniversary season, the organizers want to reinforce its standing as one of the top events of its kind in the nation.
abstract: Organizers of the Sunken Garden Poetry Festival, which is entering its 20th year, hope to reinforce its standing as one of the top events of its kind in the nation; the festival takes place at the Hill-Stead Museum in Farmington (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: As the Sunken Garden Poetry Festival enters its 20th anniversary season, the organizers want to reinforce its standing as one of the top events of its kind in the nation.

headline.seo: The Sunken Garden Poetry Festival in Farmington
headline.main: Poets, Off the Page and Under the Sky
headline.print_headline: Poets, Off the Page And Under the Sky
